Articles.Content:
Was bored and thought what if we sent a probe to the Kerbal system, what would they react like. So I drew up a good idea of how they might react.

If you can\'t read it, it says- 'Jeb, what is that?' 'I don\'t know? Lets crash into it!'
I\'m sure our reply would be much the same, albeit with a much more explosive punch.
